resources.string: Dont have an account? Register here!!

Follow the steps below to Rent the Vehicle: 
 1. Download and install the app. 
 2. Login/Register yourself. 
 3. Search for the "Vehicle type" and "City" from the given options. 
 4. Select "To" and "From" Date and tap on "Search".
 5. The app will display a list of vehicles as per your selected options. 
 6. You can sort the result based on price, rating and location. 
 7. Tap on the "Book Now" to rent the vehicle. 
 8. You can see the description of the vehicle and the owner's contact and location details by tapping on the vehicle's card. 
 9. You can check your booking by going to the "Profile" > "Booking History".

Follow the steps to put your Vehicle on Rent: 
 1. Download and install the app. 
 2. Login/Register yourself. 
 3. Go to the "Profile" page. 
 4. Tap on "Put Vehicle on Rent". 
 5. Provide details of your vehicle with the image and tap on "Submit". 
 6. Your post will be verified by the CARRENT. 
 7. Once it is verified your vehicle will be posted on the app. 
 8. You can still check your vehicles by going to the "Profile" > "Listed Vehicles".
We are always happy to have your questions and suggestions on info@carrent.com.
